result.title: Description of PhD tracking survey and joint curriculum of the PhD courses
result.description: This document will contain the developed and tested survey for PhD tracking and the description of the methodology procedure contents validity reliability and ethical considerations of the survey that ISPAS plans to developThis document will clearly describe the PhD skills courses of the joint curricula in detail and will include description of general knowledge competences and skills each course will provide In addition the description of each course will include the descriptions of prior knowledge and competences that candidates need to participate in each course forms of teaching and assessment literature and equipment and descriptions of made changes in each course that will be made after both local level and international evaluation This document will be made in two versions a printable and downloadable version and an online openly accessible version UiS UNITO UdG and IMIBAS will write the contents provide an editorproofreader for the description and take care of its dissemination

result.title: Validated model of co-Design process for e-shape
result.description: Reports for the steering committees meeting progressive elaboration of a validated model of codesign adapted to EuroGEOSS Updated communication platform on codesign processes The report will in particular describe impact of codesign on all pilots which launched codesign there will be a positive effect measured by above mentioned KPI organizational improvement new partners new users etc cognitive KPI Tshaped project portfolio with a constant balance between low TRL exploratory projects and high TRL development projects The lessons learnt on each specific case will be integrated and will be made available to all pilots

result.title: Guidelines for data cleaning and preparation
result.description: By analysing the data collection practices models of collection processes will be developed and described ITTI will model the processes using UML notation or BPMN and specify how in the next WP the data preparation and surveying wizards will be developed All necessary and relevant interactions with users will be defined These procedures will be provided to the end users in an efficient and innovative way using film tutorial or guidance application Deliverable D45
